metadata.description: Technical vocabulary for Data Engineering and AI

words.definition: A step-by-step procedure for solving a problem or accomplishing a task
words.example_sentence: The sorting algorithm improved performance significantly.

words.definition: A series of data processing steps where data flows from source to destination
words.example_sentence: We built a data pipeline to process customer events in real-time.

words.definition: A type of AI that allows systems to learn from data and improve from experience
words.example_sentence: Machine learning models can predict customer behavior.

words.definition: A computing system inspired by the brain's neural structure
words.example_sentence: The neural network achieved 95% accuracy on the test set.

words.definition: Extract, Transform, Load - a process for moving data between systems
words.example_sentence: The ETL job runs every night to update the data warehouse.

words.definition: An organized collection of structured information stored electronically
words.example_sentence: The database contains millions of customer records.

words.definition: Application Programming Interface - a way for programs to communicate
words.example_sentence: We use the REST API to fetch weather data.

words.definition: Delivery of computing services over the internet
words.example_sentence: We migrated our infrastructure to cloud computing.

words.definition: A request for information from a database
words.example_sentence: The SQL query returns all active users.

words.definition: A collection of related data organized in a structured format
words.example_sentence: We need a larger dataset to train the model.

words.definition: A subset of machine learning using multi-layered neural networks
words.example_sentence: Deep learning excels at image recognition tasks.

words.definition: The process of making software available for use
words.example_sentence: The deployment to production went smoothly.

words.definition: The ability of a system to handle increased load
words.example_sentence: Scalability is crucial for growing businesses.

words.definition: The delay before data transfer begins
words.example_sentence: We reduced the API latency to under 100ms.

words.definition: The structure or organization of a database
words.example_sentence: We updated the database schema to add new fields.

words.definition: The amount of data processed in a given time
words.example_sentence: The system has a throughput of 10,000 requests per second.

words.definition: An individual measurable property used in machine learning
words.example_sentence: Age is an important feature in this model.

words.definition: The process of teaching a machine learning model
words.example_sentence: Model training took 24 hours on the GPU cluster.

words.definition: Using a trained model to make predictions
words.example_sentence: Inference time is critical for real-time applications.

words.definition: Automated coordination of complex workflows
words.example_sentence: We use Airflow for pipeline orchestration.

words.definition: Processing data in groups rather than in real-time
words.example_sentence: Batch processing runs overnight to generate reports.

words.definition: Processing data continuously as it arrives
words.example_sentence: We implemented streaming for real-time analytics.

words.definition: A learned representation of data in a vector space
words.example_sentence: Word embeddings capture semantic relationships.

words.definition: A unit of text in natural language processing
words.example_sentence: The model processes text as a sequence of tokens.

words.definition: A neural network architecture using attention mechanisms
words.example_sentence: GPT is based on the transformer architecture.

words.definition: Input text given to a language model
words.example_sentence: A well-crafted prompt improves model output.

words.definition: Adapting a pre-trained model for a specific task
words.example_sentence: Fine-tuning improved accuracy by 10%.

words.definition: A centralized repository for raw data in various formats
words.example_sentence: We store all raw data in the data lake.

words.definition: A system for reporting and analysis of structured data
words.example_sentence: The data warehouse powers our BI dashboards.

words.definition: A division of data for improved query performance
words.example_sentence: We partition the table by date for faster queries.
